title: Locality in Random SAT Instances.
abstract: This work was partially supported by the MINECO/FEDER project RASO (TIN2015-71799-C2-1-P), the CSIC project LOGAL (201450E045), and the European Research Council under the European Union’s Seventh Framework Programme (FP7/2007–2013) / ERC grant agreement no. 279611.
